akn:content.akn:p:
§ 4201. Repealed. Pub. L. 97–258, § 5(b), Sept. 13, 1982, 96 Stat. 1068
Section, Pub. L. 90–577, title I, §§ 101–110, Oct. 16, 1968, 82 Stat. 1098–1101, defined terms used in this chapter. See sections 6501 and 6505(a) of Title 31, Money and Finance.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Short TitlePub. L. 90–577, § 1, Oct. 16, 1968, 82 Stat. 1098, which provided that Pub. L. 90–577 could be cited as the “Intergovernmental Cooperation Act of 1968”, was repealed by Pub. L. 97–258, § 5(b), Sept. 13, 1982, 96 Stat. 1068, 1080.
